import _objectSpread from"C:/co-1016/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";/**

 */class PerformanceProfiler{constructor(){this.metrics={};this.observers=[];this.renderTimings={};this.memoryBaseline=null;// Performance Observer ì„¤ì •
this.initializeObservers();// Memory baseline ì„¤ì •
if('memory'in performance){this.memoryBaseline={usedJSHeapSize:performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize,totalJSHeapSize:performance.memory.totalJSHeapSize,timestamp:Date.now()};}}// Performance Observers ì´ˆê¸°í™”
initializeObservers(){try{// Navigation timing (íŽ˜ì´ì§€ ë¡œë“œ)
if('PerformanceObserver'in window){const navigationObserver=new PerformanceObserver(list=>{for(const entry of list.getEntries()){if(entry.entryType==='navigation'){this.metrics.pageLoad={domContentLoaded:entry.domContentLoadedEventEnd-entry.domContentLoadedEventStart,loadComplete:entry.loadEventEnd-entry.loadEventStart,total:entry.loadEventEnd-entry.fetchStart};}}});navigationObserver.observe({entryTypes:['navigation']});this.observers.push(navigationObserver);// Measure entries (ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ ì¸¡ì •)
const measureObserver=new PerformanceObserver(list=>{for(const entry of list.getEntries()){if(entry.name.startsWith('curator-')){this.metrics[entry.name]=entry.duration;}}});measureObserver.observe({entryTypes:['measure']});this.observers.push(measureObserver);// Layout Shift (CLS)
const layoutShiftObserver=new PerformanceObserver(list=>{let cumulativeScore=0;for(const entry of list.getEntries()){if(!entry.hadRecentInput){cumulativeScore+=entry.value;}}this.metrics.cumulativeLayoutShift=cumulativeScore;});layoutShiftObserver.observe({entryTypes:['layout-shift']});this.observers.push(layoutShiftObserver);}}catch(error){console.warn('Performance Observer not supported:',error);}}// ì°¨íŠ¸ ë Œë”ë§ ì‹œê°„ ì¸¡ì • ì‹œìž‘
startRenderMeasurement(chartType){const markName="curator-".concat(chartType,"-render-start");performance.mark(markName);this.renderTimings[chartType]={startMark:markName};// ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ì‚¬ìš©ëŸ‰ ì¸¡ì • ì‹œìž‘
if('memory'in performance){this.renderTimings[chartType].memoryStart=performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize;}console.log("\uD83D\uDD2C [Performance] ".concat(chartType," \uB80C\uB354\uB9C1 \uCE21\uC815 \uC2DC\uC791"));}// ì°¨íŠ¸ ë Œë”ë§ ì‹œê°„ ì¸¡ì • ì¢…ë£Œ
endRenderMeasurement(chartType){const endMarkName="curator-".concat(chartType,"-render-end");const measureName="curator-".concat(chartType,"-render-duration");performance.mark(endMarkName);try{performance.measure(measureName,this.renderTimings[chartType].startMark,endMarkName);const measure=performance.getEntriesByName(measureName)[0];const renderTime=measure.duration;// ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ì‚¬ìš©ëŸ‰ ì¸¡ì •
let memoryUsage=null;if('memory'in performance&&this.renderTimings[chartType].memoryStart){const memoryEnd=performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize;memoryUsage={used:memoryEnd-this.renderTimings[chartType].memoryStart,total:performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize,limit:performance.memory.totalJSHeapSize};}// ê²°ê³¼ ì €ìž¥
this.metrics["".concat(chartType,"_render_time")]=renderTime;if(memoryUsage){this.metrics["".concat(chartType,"_memory_usage")]=memoryUsage;}console.log("\u2705 [Performance] ".concat(chartType," \uB80C\uB354\uB9C1 \uC644\uB8CC: ").concat(renderTime.toFixed(2),"ms"));if(memoryUsage){console.log("\uD83D\uDCCA [Memory] ".concat(chartType," \uBA54\uBAA8\uB9AC \uC0AC\uC6A9: ").concat((memoryUsage.used/1024/1024).toFixed(2),"MB"));}return{renderTime,memoryUsage};}catch(error){console.error('Performance measurement error:',error);return null;}}// ì¸í„°ëž™ì…˜ ì‘ë‹µ ì‹œê°„ ì¸¡ì •
measureInteraction(interactionType,callback){var _this=this;const startTime=performance.now();const wrappedCallback=function(){const endTime=performance.now();const responseTime=endTime-startTime;_this.metrics["".concat(interactionType,"_response_time")]=responseTime;console.log("\u26A1 [Interaction] ".concat(interactionType," \uC751\uB2F5 \uC2DC\uAC04: ").concat(responseTime.toFixed(2),"ms"));if(callback){return callback(...arguments);}};return wrappedCallback;}// ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
getMemoryStats(){if(!('memory'in performance)){return{available:false};}const current=performance.memory;const baseline=this.memoryBaseline;return{available:true,current:{used:current.usedJSHeapSize,total:current.totalJSHeapSize,limit:current.jsHeapSizeLimit},growth:baseline?{absolute:current.usedJSHeapSize-baseline.usedJSHeapSize,relative:(current.usedJSHeapSize-baseline.usedJSHeapSize)/baseline.usedJSHeapSize*100,duration:Date.now()-baseline.timestamp}:null,formatted:{used:"".concat((current.usedJSHeapSize/1024/1024).toFixed(2),"MB"),total:"".concat((current.totalJSHeapSize/1024/1024).toFixed(2),"MB"),limit:"".concat((current.jsHeapSizeLimit/1024/1024).toFixed(2),"MB"),percentage:"".concat((current.usedJSHeapSize/current.totalJSHeapSize*100).toFixed(1),"%")}};}// ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³´ê³ ì„œ ìƒì„±
generateReport(){const memoryStats=this.getMemoryStats();const report={timestamp:new Date().toISOString(),phase:'Phase 2 - Temporal Analysis',measurements:this.metrics,memory:memoryStats,recommendations:this.generateRecommendations()};console.group('ðŸ”¬ Dr. Sarah Kim\'s Performance Report');console.log('ì¸¡ì • ì‹œì :',report.timestamp);console.log('ì„±ëŠ¥ ì§€í‘œ:',report.measurements);console.log('ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ìƒíƒœ:',report.memory);console.log('ìµœì í™” ê¶Œìž¥ì‚¬í•­:',report.recommendations);console.groupEnd();return report;}// ìµœì í™” ê¶Œìž¥ì‚¬í•­ ìƒì„±
generateRecommendations(){const recommendations=[];// ë Œë”ë§ ì‹œê°„ ë¶„ì„
Object.entries(this.metrics).forEach(_ref=>{let[key,value]=_ref;if(key.endsWith('_render_time')){const chartType=key.replace('_render_time','');if(value>300){recommendations.push({type:'performance',severity:'high',chart:chartType,issue:"\uB80C\uB354\uB9C1 \uC2DC\uAC04 \uACFC\uB2E4 (".concat(value.toFixed(2),"ms > 300ms)"),solution:'Canvas fallback ë˜ëŠ” ë°ì´í„° ìƒ˜í”Œë§ ì ìš© ê¶Œìž¥'});}else if(value>200){recommendations.push({type:'performance',severity:'medium',chart:chartType,issue:"\uB80C\uB354\uB9C1 \uC2DC\uAC04 \uC8FC\uC758 (".concat(value.toFixed(2),"ms)"),solution:'D3 ìµœì í™” ë˜ëŠ” ì• ë‹ˆë©”ì´ì…˜ ë‹¨ìˆœí™” ê²€í† '});}}});// ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ì‚¬ìš©ëŸ‰ ë¶„ì„
if(this.metrics.memory&&this.metrics.memory.used>100*1024*1024){// 100MB
recommendations.push({type:'memory',severity:'high',issue:"\uBA54\uBAA8\uB9AC \uC0AC\uC6A9\uB7C9 \uACFC\uB2E4 (".concat((this.metrics.memory.used/1024/1024).toFixed(2),"MB)"),solution:'ë°ì´í„° ì •ë¦¬, ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ë¦¬ìŠ¤ë„ˆ ì œê±°, ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ëˆ„ìˆ˜ ì ê²€'});}// ì¸í„°ëž™ì…˜ ì‘ë‹µì„± ë¶„ì„
Object.entries(this.metrics).forEach(_ref2=>{let[key,value]=_ref2;if(key.endsWith('_response_time')&&value>16){// 60fps ê¸°ì¤€
recommendations.push({type:'interaction',severity:value>50?'high':'medium',issue:"\uC778\uD130\uB799\uC158 \uC9C0\uC5F0 (".concat(value.toFixed(2),"ms > 16ms)"),solution:'debouncing, throttling, ë˜ëŠ” Web Workers í™œìš© ê¶Œìž¥'});}});return recommendations;}// ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìž‘
startRealTimeMonitoring(){let interval=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:5000;const monitor=setInterval(()=>{const memoryStats=this.getMemoryStats();const report={timestamp:Date.now(),memory:memoryStats.formatted,metrics:Object.keys(this.metrics).length};// ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ì¦ê°€ ê²½ê³ 
if(memoryStats.growth&&memoryStats.growth.relative>50){console.warn("\u26A0\uFE0F [Memory Alert] ".concat(memoryStats.growth.relative.toFixed(1),"% \uC99D\uAC00 \uAC10\uC9C0"));}// ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € DevToolsì— ì „ì†¡ (ê°œë°œ ëª¨ë“œì—ì„œ)
if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){window.__CURATOR_PERFORMANCE__=report;}},interval);return monitor;}// Clean up
destroy(){this.observers.forEach(observer=>observer.disconnect());this.observers=[];this.metrics={};}}// ì „ì—­ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ìƒì„±
export const performanceProfiler=new PerformanceProfiler();// React Hook for Performance Monitoring
export const usePerformanceMonitoring=componentName=>{const[performanceData,setPerformanceData]=React.useState(null);React.useEffect(()=>{performanceProfiler.startRenderMeasurement(componentName);return()=>{const result=performanceProfiler.endRenderMeasurement(componentName);setPerformanceData(result);};},[componentName]);return performanceData;};// ìœ í‹¸ë¦¬í‹° í•¨ìˆ˜ë“¤
export const measureAsync=async(name,asyncOperation)=>{performanceProfiler.startRenderMeasurement(name);try{const result=await asyncOperation();performanceProfiler.endRenderMeasurement(name);return result;}catch(error){performanceProfiler.endRenderMeasurement(name);throw error;}};export const withPerformanceTracking=(WrappedComponent,componentName)=>{return function PerformanceTrackedComponent(props){const performanceData=usePerformanceMonitoring(componentName);return React.createElement(WrappedComponent,_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},props),{},{__performanceData:performanceData}));};};export default performanceProfiler;
